warped.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who is warped has ideas or thoughts that most people think are unpleasant or not normal
warped.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You really have a warped sense of humour  (=think strange and unpleasant things are funny).
warped.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is warped is bent or twisted so that it is not the correct shape
